creator: AG Tech Pro
descriptionHtml:
Lottery Sambad app only publish lottery result approved by Indian State Government, apart from this you will not see any other kind of result.

Lottery Sambad App is a free lottery result publish app. Through this app you can see the result of Nagaland State Lottery and West Bengal State Lottery. From time to time first of all you will get to see Morning Lottery Result 01:00PM, Day Lottery Result 06:00PM and Night Lottery Result 08:00PM on this app.

Freatures of Lottery Sambad App:
Inside this app you will get to see result page quickly and in good quality. You can check your lottery Sambad Result through a few clicks. To see the morning result, you can check it at 1:00 PM through this lottery Sambad app. To see the evening results at 6:00 PM, you can see through this app, to see the night results, you can easily see the lottery results at 8:00 PM.
Four buttons have been given on the home page of lottery Sambad app first button morning result 1:00 PM, second button day result 6:00 PM, third button night result 8:00 PM.
If you want to see Morning Lottery Result then click on 1:00 PM, then if you want to see Dear Day Lottery Result then click on 6:00 PM, and if you want to see Night Lottery Result then click on 1:00 PM Click on PM button.

Old Result:
Lottery Sambad app shows the old 90 days lottery results, for this you have to click on the old result button.

Lottery sambad app publish all these state government approved lottery results given below:
> Nagaland State Lottery Results
> West Bengal State Lottery Results
> Sikkim State Lottery Results
> Mizoram State Lottery Results
> Kerala Lottery Results
> Bangabhumi Lottery Results
> Punjab Dear Lottery Results
> Bhutan Lottery Results
> Bangashree Lottery Results

Disclaimer:
This lottery Sambad App is not an official app or is not associated with any state lottery result board. We just collect the result page from the official website that publishes the state lottery result or from the newspaper and publish it on this app.
That's why we advise you that after checking the result of our app, you must definitely check it on any official website because we do not want that any confusion remains inside you.
Of course, use this app on your own risk, if there is any problem or dispute of any kind, we are not responsible for it.
descriptionShort: Lottery Sambad App is a Daily Lottery Result Publish App on Time 1PM 6PM 8PM
